title: Provider
description: A resource that represents the configuration of a Provider.

grantType.title: Grant Type
grantType.description: The grant type for the OAuth 2.0 Flow. Today, Authorization Code Flow and Client Credentials Flow are supported.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: The client ID for the Provider app.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: The client secret for the Provider app.

allowedScopes.title: Allowed Scopes
allowedScopes.description: The list of scopes that a Linked Account can potentially have with this Provider.

name.title: Scope Name
name.description: The scope name, i.e. 'refresh_token' for Salesforce.

isRequired.title: Is Required
isRequired.description: Determines whether this scope is required.

authorizationConfig.title: Authorization Config
authorizationConfig.description: The URL configuration used to direct a user to the Provider’s authentication page.

url.title: Authorization URL
url.description: The URL used to direct a user to the Provider’s authentication page.

queryParams.title: Query Parameters
queryParams.description: Query parameters to pass along with the request.

scopeDelimiter.title: Scope Delimiter
scopeDelimiter.description: The delimiter that indicates the separation between each scope. If not set, space will be used.

tokenConfig.title: Token Config
tokenConfig.description: The URL configuration used to extract tokens during authentication & refresh.

url.title: Token URL
url.description: The URL used to fetch tokens from a provider.

queryParams.title: Query Parameters
queryParams.description: Query parameters to pass along with the request.

credentialLocation.title: Client Credentials Location
credentialLocation.description: Indicates where/how the client-id/secret should be passed.

scopeDelimiter.title: Scope Delimiter
scopeDelimiter.description: The delimiter that indicates the separation between each scope if returned in the response. If not set, space will be used.

errorParsingConfig.title: Error Parsing Configuration
errorParsingConfig.description: The configuration used to find the errors to parse in the response.

errorCode.title: Error Code
errorCode.description: The JMES path to the error code to get from the response.

errorDescription.title: Error Description
errorDescription.description: The JMES path to the error description to get from the response.
